original_text: And they came unto the brook of Eshcol, and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes, and they bare it between two upon a staff; and they brought of the pomegranates, and of the figs.
korean_text: 또 에스골 골짜기에 이르러 거기서 포도송이가 달린 가지를 베어 둘이 막대기에 꿰어 메고 또 석류와 무화과를 따니라

sentences.original_text: And they came unto the brook of Eshcol,
and cut down from thence a branch with one cluster of grapes,
sentences.korean_translation: 거기서 포도 한 송이가 달린 가지를 꺾어,

sentences.original_text: and they bare it between two upon a staff;
and they brought of the pomegranates,
